doc.field: The Rector and Visitors of the University of Virginia
Emmanuel Episcopal Church: 1862 appearance before the many alterations
creation: 1862-1963; alteration: 1890; alteration: 1905; alteration: 1911-1914; alteration: 1930s; alteration: 1940s1960; alteration: 1983; alteration: 1905; alteration: 1960; alteration: 1983
Owlsley Mausoleum--Original like Mount Ed Baptist and Batesville Methodist Churches
Original: Brick, Brick Pilasters, 2 Door; then much alteration with Steeple, Flemish Bond, 2 Leaf Door, Bell Tower, Palladian Motif, 8/8, Rounded Windows, Blinds; Cemetery, Tempietto Tomb
Waddy Wood, Architect 1905-15--Milton Grigg, Architect 1960--Doug Gilpin, Architect 1983
survey data: National Register of Historic Places--Virginia Landmarks Register--Studies in Vernacular Architecture--Architecture in Virginia--Virginia Road Traces
